summary: The factual story of Spaniard Ramon Sampedro, who fought a thirty-year campaign in favor of euthanasia and his own right to die.
cast: Javier Bardem|Belén Rueda|Lola Dueñas|Mabel Rivera|Celso Bugallo|Clara Segura|Joan Dalmau|Alberto Jiménez|Tamar Novas|Francesc Garrido|Josep Maria Pou|Alberto Amarilla|Andrea Occhipinti|Federico Pérez Rey|Nicolás Fernández Luna|Raúl Lavisier|Xosé Manuel Olveira 'Pico'|César Cambeiro|Xosé Manuel Esperante|Iolanda Muíños|Adolfo Obregón|José Luis Rodríguez|Julio Jordán|Juan Manuel Vidal|Marta Larralde|Jordi Ballester
title: Mar adentro
